ISSUE.TITLE: Accessibility - Category List Option Buttons are not toggleable by keyboard
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 45.0.1 Steps to reproduce the problem: If you navigate to any category page that has product listed, you will not be able to tab to these icons ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/80290921/165633066-c04a3396-0273-497f-a632-617b6e6d956c.png) to change them via the keyboard, making them only usable by clicking on them. They need the following attributes added to the anchor tags: 1. tabindex 2. aria-role (for screen reader) 3. href="#" so hitting enter triggers action Thanks!
